subject: Trademarks and Trade Names
College Athletics
Art
Copyrights and Copyright Violations
Football
Suits and Litigation
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Daniel Moore has depicted Alabama football in paintings for years, but the university wants him to sign a licensing agreement. An appeal of the case will be heard Thursday.
snippet: Daniel Moore has depicted Alabama football in paintings for years, but the university wants him to sign a licensing agreement. An appeal of the case will be heard Thursday.
